Package tetrisgame

Class TetrisPanel

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
tetrisgame.TetrisPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Accessible
public class TetrisPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable
The TetrisPanel class represents the game board for a Tetris game. It handles the rendering of the board, the current and next Tetromino Tetromino, as well as game logic like clearing rows and detecting game over conditions. It also stores boolean flags representing whether it's paused or has been updated
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • Squares

      protected TetrisSquare[][] Squares
      A 2D array of squares representing the Tetris game board.

    • base

      protected transient Color base
      The base color for unoccupied squares on the board. Transient to avoid being serialized.

      protected Tetromino currTetro
      The currently active Tetromino being controlled by the player.

      The next Tetromino that will appear on the board.

  • Method Details

    • initTrans

      public void initTrans()
      Initializes transient fields after deserialization.

    • paintComponent

      protected void paintComponent(Graphics g)
      Overriding the painCompononent method of the JPanel class We paint a filled square for every Tetris square TetrisSquare stored in the Board The squares are coloured to the Color of the corresponding Square The method also draws the lines of the grid after having drawn the squares.
      Overrides:
      paintComponent in class JComponent
      Parameters:
      g - The Graphics object used to render the board.

    • isLost

      public boolean isLost()
      Checks if the game is lost (when a locked square is in the top row).
      Returns:
      True if the game is lost, false otherwise.

    • checkRows

      public void checkRows()
      Checks and clears full rows. Uses the locked flag of the Squares TetrisSquare to identify the ones that are fixed in place If a row is full of locked squares, it calls the deleteRow method and updates the score

    • deleteRow

      public void deleteRow(int i)
      Deletes a full row and shifts rows above it down.
      Parameters:
      i - The index of the row to delete.

    • pauseGame

      public void pauseGame()
      Pauses the game and stops the current Tetromino's movement.

    • resumeGame

      public void resumeGame()
      Resumes the game and restarts the current Tetromino's movement.

    • changeTetro

      public void changeTetro()
      Replaces the current Tetromino with the next one and generates a new next Tetromino Tetromino. It sets the updated flag to true to indicate that the game window GameFrame the TetrisHUD needs updating

    • doFrame

      public void doFrame()
      Advances the game frame Checks for full rows every frame Checks for losing condition every frame Repaints the Board

    • moveLeft

      public void moveLeft()
      Moves the current Tetromino Tetromino to the left.

    • moveRight

      public void moveRight()
      Moves the current Tetromino to the right.

    • rotateTetro

      public void rotateTetro()
      Rotates the current Tetromino clockwise.
